attributes.action: Not ban illegal downloaders from the internet by their ISP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People in the UK who go online and illegally download music and films may have their internet access cut under plans the government is considering.

The companies get paid enough and now they want to ban the innocent users who download to get away from the 'ned' cultures that are taking over the UK

rejection.details: No such proposals have been put forward.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
